news.title: Justia CLE & Webinars | AI: Legal Developments, Risks & Benefits
news.description: With the rise of artificial intelligence (AI) and its lingering presence in just about every profession out there, it may be time to concede that not only is AI here to stay, it is here to make significant changes. As is with all things new and unknown, you are bound to face unforeseen developments, risks, and benefits. If you want to stay ahead of the curve, keep on reading!

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Child Custody and Support Law Center
news.description: When parents part ways, each may fight hard to preserve their bond with a child and protect the child’s future. The Child Custody and Support Law Center provided by Justia discusses the challenges that can arise and potential solutions.

news.title: Key Rulings From the 2023-2024 Supreme Court Term
news.description: It’s been a year of ups and downs in the legal world, with eyes around the U.S. glued to the TV, phone, and computer for some of the biggest legal news stories to come out in a while. With such a big year in the legal field, we mustn’t forget about the impactful rulings that the U.S. Supreme Court has made in the past year.
